post.text: In America, if you can dream it, you should be able to build it.

comment.author: Maya
comment.text: People, stop being brainwashed ! Are you better off in the last 8 years? She is a crook criminal !

replies.author: Derrick
replies.text: Yes---I am really happy about the 3 trillion in middle class wages lost under the Bush Administration

replies.author: Katie
replies.text: Maya your facebook profile is fake. Are you a criminal ?

replies.author: Maya
replies.text: Derrickmary another brainwashed soul. Educate yourself and watch The documentary "Clinton Cash" and "Hillary America". It's free now on YouTube . I do respect your opinion but please educate yourself before you cast your vote!

replies.author: Derrick
replies.text: Maya An educated person pays no heed to right wing propaganda----I suggest you get a real source and look at the govt charts during the recession up until now----use your Google.

replies.author: Maya
replies.text: Derrickmary use your brain and not Hillary controlled Facebook and Google. A typical Democrat!
